overview: The 100th Running Man Championship, which finally started, 7 running men representing each race. In the first round of Bell Hunter, Liu, the representative of the bug tribe, won the victory, followed by the second battle of superpowers. In a survival game in which each person competes using their given superpowers, the player who kept the shield until the end amid repeated alliances and betrayals is Kuga, the representative of the Bars tribe. And in the middle of the night, in the laboratory under the main stadium, something unusual seems to be happening while the tournament organizer Charming Gold is watching.
title: Running Man Special: The Beginning of the Game
